metadata.title: CVE-2023-41322 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI stands for Gestionnaire Libre de Parc Informatique is a Free Asset andIT Management Software package, that provides ITIL Service Desk features,licenses tracking and software auditing. A user with write access toanother user can make requests to change the latter's password and thentake control of their account. Users are advised to upgrade to version10.0.10. There are no known work around for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
